resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: René Ribière, a right-wing deputy, demanded a duel to punish Defferre for his insolence. René Ribière was hit twice and Gaston Defferre stopped the fight, especially since Defferre was to get married the next day.
resource.chars: René Ribière, a right-wing deputy, demanded a duel to punish Defferre for his insolence. René Ribière was hit twice and Gaston Defferre stopped the fight, especially since Defferre was to get married the next day.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M513.53427,558.0246h-196.78647v0h-196.78647v-273.08612v-273.08612h196.78647h196.78647v273.08612z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_879296db-623b-460c-bf82-caa1da11f697" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Gaston Defferre, Mayor of Marseille and President of the Socialist Group in the National Assembly won the duel.
resource.chars: Gaston Defferre, Mayor of Marseille and President of the Socialist Group in the National Assembly won the duel.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: In 1967 the last duel of honor took place in France. Two French politicians clashed with the sword after insulting each other in the National Assembly.
resource.chars: In 1967 the last duel of honor took place in France. Two French politicians clashed with the sword after insulting each other in the National Assembly.
